mapper.select: SELECT i.id,c.top_cate,i.cate_id,i.name,i.price,i.imgname,i.rdate FROM item i, category c WHERE i.cate_id = c.id AND c.top_cate = #{top_cate}
SELECT MAX(ITEM_ID) AS LagestId FROM item

SELECT a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG, COUNT(b.REVIEW_ID) as cnt, NVL(ROUND(AVG(b.REVIEW_SCORE),0),0) as avgscore FROM item a left outer join item_review b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where a.category_id in(100,200) GROUP BY a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG

SELECT a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG, COUNT(b.REVIEW_ID) as cnt, NVL(ROUND(AVG(b.REVIEW_SCORE),0),0) as avgscore FROM item a left outer join item_review b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where a.category_id in (#{category_id}) GROUP BY a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG

SELECT a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG, COUNT(b.REVIEW_ID) as cnt, NVL(ROUND(AVG(b.REVIEW_SCORE),0),0) as avgscore FROM item a left outer join item_review b ON a.item_id = b.item_id where a.flower_type in (#{flower_type}) GROUP BY a.ITEM_ID, a.CATEGORY_ID, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_CNT, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_CONTENT, a.ITEM_RDATE, a.FLOWER_COLOR, a.FLOWER_TYPE, a.FLOWER_SIZE, a.MAIN_IMG
